title: Mandram Vantha Thendralukku Lyrics Mouna Ragam
stanzas:
mandram vantha thendralukku
manjam vara nenjam illaiyo
anbe en anbe

thotta udan suttathenna
katta azhagu vatta nilavo
kanne en kanne

mandram vantha thendralukku
manjam vara nenjam illaiyo
anbe en anbe

sonthagale illamal
bantha paasam kollamal
poove un vaazhkai
thaan enna soll

mandram vantha thendralukku
manjam vara nenjam illaiyo
anbe en anbe

medaiyai pole vaazhkai alla
naadagam aanathum
vizhagi sella
odaiyai pole uravum alla
paadhaigal maariye
payanam sella
pennodu thaan oolavum
velli vanna nilaavum
ennodu nee vanthal enna vaa

mandram vantha thendralukku
manjam vara nenjam illaiyo
anbe en anbe

thotta udan suttathenna
katta azhagu vatta nilavo
kanne en kanne

mandram vantha thendralukku
manjam vara nenjam illaiyo
anbe en anbe
